# PED::CLEAR_PED_ALTERNATE_WALK_ANIM

## Summary
MAkes the ped go back to using its original walk anim.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **FLOAT** blendDelta = -8: A float value specifying how fast the anim should blend back to the normal walk

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Specifies a new walking animation to use when the ped is walking around
